text:
Davi Samuel Alcolumbre Tobelem (born 19 June 1977) is a Brazilian politician. He is the President of the Senate of Brazil since 2019. He has been a Senator, representing the state of Amapá, since 2015. He is a member of the Democrats.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Alcolumbre had tested positive for COVID-19.
